jdbcService.sql: select t.id, t.modified, t.context, t.name, t.translation from master_data_entries me join master_data_categories mc on me.master_data_category_id = mc.id join translations t on t.context = mc.name and t.name = me.name join master_data_entries mt on t.language_id = mt.id where mt.name = :language and (:query is null or t.name ilike '%' || :query || '%' or t.translation ilike '%' || :query || '%') order by mc.name, me.name
